description: The Strawberry Daiquiri is one exceptionally outstanding variation to the classic&nbsp;daiquiri recipe, with its sweet, fruity, and intense flavors. Add to this the fact that its luscious red color is very pleasing to the eye. This drink is sure to be the star of your next&nbsp;cocktail party!
name: Strawberry Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: Â½ oz. Freshly squeezed lime juice
Fresh whole or sliced strawberry, for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the rum, simple syrup, strawberries, and lime juice in a blender. Add ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the rum, simple syrup, strawberries, and lime juice in a blender. Add ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Set the blender at high speed and blend until you achieve a smooth consistency.
recipeInstructions.text: Set the blender at high speed and blend until you achieve a smooth consistency.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with fresh strawberry slices.
recipeInstructions.text: Serve into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with fresh strawberry slices.
